title: Patient Care Practical Competency Enhancement: Generative AI-Supported Fictional Creative Reading Strategy Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic reading and writing skills, experience with simple digital tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can creatively adapt at least three science fiction stories using generative AI.
Learners can improve their linguistic flexibility score by 20% through the process of reconstructing characters, plots, and events based on AI-generated content.
Learners can submit collaborative creations from digital platforms as part of their project portfolio.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
